dynamic_elements.chart_query: PREFIX musow: <https://w3id.org/musow/vocab/> SELECT ?x (COUNT(?content) AS ?y) WHERE { {?content ?p musow:repository . musow:repository rdfs:label ?x .} UNION {?content ?p musow:catalogue . musow:catalogue rdfs:label ?x .} UNION {?content ?p musow:dataset . musow:dataset rdfs:label ?x .} UNION {?content ?p musow:digital-library . musow:digital-library rdfs:label ?x .} UNION {?content ?p musow:software . musow:software rdfs:label ?x .} } GROUP BY ?x
